gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Wǒ měitiān dōu dú bàozhǐ.

gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Zhè gè wèntí hěn yǒuqù.

gpt-3.5-turbo.english: We should tell him about this matter.

gpt-3.5-turbo.english: You need a plane ticket to take a flight.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Nǐ xūyào jīpiào cái néng zuò fēijī.

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 這張車票可以坐一個小時的公車。
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: This bus ticket allows you to ride the bus for one hour.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Zhè zhāng chēpiào kěyǐ zuò yīgè xiǎoshí de gōngchē.

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 昨天晚上我在網上訂了電影票。
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: Last night, I booked a movie ticket online.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Zuótiān wǎnshàng wǒ zài wǎngshàng dìngle diànyǐngpiào.

gpt-3.5-turbo.english: Please give me two entrance tickets.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Qǐng gěi wǒ liǎng zhāng rùchǎngquàn.

gpt-3.5-turbo.english: What is the meaning of this word?
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Zhège cí de yìsi shì shénme?

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 她說話的意思我聽不懂。
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: I don't understand the meaning of what she said.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Tā shuōhuà de yìsi wǒ tīngbùdǒng.

gpt-3.5-turbo.english: His eyes reveal a joyful meaning.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Tā de yǎnshén tòulù chū yúkuài de yìsi.

gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Zhè fú huà yǒu tèshū de yìsi.

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 這家餐廳的牆壁是黃色的。

gpt-3.5-turbo.english: The teacher thanks the students for their efforts.

gpt-3.5-turbo.english: I want to thank you for helping me.

gpt-3.5-turbo.english: Mom thanks dad for cooking.

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 我要謝謝朋友的生日禮物。
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: I want to thank my friend for the birthday gift.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Wǒ yào xièxiè péngyǒu de shēngrì lǐwù.

gpt-3.5-turbo.english: I thank you for the invitation.

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 謝謝你的幫助，我不客氣。
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: Thank you for your help, you're welcome.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Xièxiè nǐ de bāngzhù, wǒ bù kèqì.

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 他拿起那本書，說不客氣。
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: He picked up the book and said, you're welcome.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Tā ná qǐ nà běn shū, shuō bù kèqì.

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 我不客氣，這是我的工作。
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: You're welcome, it's my job.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Wǒ bù kèqì, zhè shì wǒ de gōngzuò.

gpt-3.5-turbo.english: Don't mention it, we're friends.

gpt-3.5-turbo.english: Please sit down, you're welcome.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Qǐng zuòxià, bù kèqì.

gpt-3.5-turbo.english: I said goodbye to my friend.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Wǒ gēn péngyǒu shuō zàijiàn.

gpt-3.5-turbo.english: See you tomorrow! Goodbye!

gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Tā duì lǎoshī shuō zàijiàn.

gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Wǒ hěn shěbude shuō zàijiàn.

gpt-3.5-turbo.english: Goodbye, wish you a smooth journey!
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Zàijiàn, zhù nǐ yīlù shùnfēng!

gpt-3.5-turbo.english: I invite you to have a meal.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Wǒ qǐng nǐ qù chīfàn.

gpt-3.5-turbo.english: He treats me to tea.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Tā qǐng wǒ hē chá.

gpt-3.5-turbo.english: Excuse me, is there a bank here?
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Qǐngwèn, zhèlǐ yǒu yínháng ma?

gpt-3.5-turbo.english: Please don't disturb me.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Qǐng búyào dǎrǎo wǒ.

gpt-3.5-turbo.english: I'll treat you to a cup of coffee.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Wǒ qǐng nǐ hē bēi kāfēi.

gpt-3.5-turbo.english: Sorry, I am late.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Duì bù qǐ, wǒ chídào le.

gpt-3.5-turbo.english: I owe my friend an apology.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Wǒ duìbùqǐ wǒ de péngyǒu.

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 他向我道歉，我說“對不起”就可以了。
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: He apologized to me, and I just need to say 'Sorry'.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Tā xiàng wǒ dàoqiàn, wǒ shuō “duìbùqǐ” jiù kěyǐ le.

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 對不起！我把你的筆弄丟了。
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: I'm sorry! I lost your pen.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Duìbùqǐ! Wǒ bǎ nǐ de bǐ nòng diū le.

gpt-3.5-turbo.english: I'm sorry, I didn't mean it.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Duìbùqǐ, wǒ bú shì gùyì de.

gpt-3.5-turbo.english: You are late, it's okay.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Nǐ chídào le, méi guānxi.

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 我不小心打破了你的杯子，對不起，沒關係嗎？
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: I accidentally broke your cup, sorry, is it okay?
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Wǒ bù xiǎoxīn dǎpò le nǐ de bēizi, duìbùqǐ, méi guānxi ma?

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 我沒有做好，但是老闆對我說：沒關係，下次注意。
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: I didn't do well, but the boss told me: it's okay, pay attention next time.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Wǒ méiyǒu zuò hǎo, dànshì lǎobǎn duì wǒ shuō: méi guānxi, xià cì zhùyì.

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 我沒有帶傘，被雨淋濕了，不過沒關係，我不怕。
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: I didn't bring an umbrella and got wet in the rain, but it's okay, I'm not afraid.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Wǒ méiyǒu dài sǎn, bèi yǔ lín shī le, bùguò méi guānxi, wǒ bùpà.

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 我沒聽清楚你說的話，但是沒關係，你可以再說一遍。
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: I didn't hear clearly what you said, but it's okay, you can say it again.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Wǒ méi tīng qīngchu nǐ shuō de huà, dànshì méi guānxi, nǐ kěyǐ zài shuō yíbiàn.

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 我們非常歡迎你的到來。
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: We warmly welcome your arrival.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Wǒmen fēicháng huānyíng nǐ de dàolái.

gpt-3.5-turbo.english: Please welcome the new classmate.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Qǐng dàjiā dōu huānyíng xīn tóngxué.

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 這裡的人們非常熱情地歡迎遊客。
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: The people here warmly welcome the tourists.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Zhèlǐ de rénmen fēicháng rèqíng de huānyíng yóukè.

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 歡迎大家參加我們的活動。
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: Welcome everyone to participate in our activity.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Huānyíng dàjiā cānjiā wǒmen de huódòng.

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 我們非常歡迎你的意見和建議。
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: We greatly welcome your opinions and suggestions.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Wǒmen fēicháng huānyíng nǐ de yìjiàn hé jiànyì.

gpt-3.5-turbo.english: I heard a strange sound last night.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Wǒ zuówǎn tīngdào le qíguài de shēngyīn.

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 他很專心地聽老師講課。
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: He attentively listens to the teacher's lecture.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Tā hěn zhuānxīn de tīng lǎoshī jiǎngkè.

gpt-3.5-turbo.english: He likes talking to people.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Tā hěn xǐhuān gēn rén shuōhuà.

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 她一直在說話，沒有停下來。
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: She kept speaking without stopping.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Tā yīzhí zài shuōhuà, méiyǒu tíng xiàlái.

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 你可以說話了，請告訴我你的名字。
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: You can speak now, please tell me your name.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Nǐ kěyǐ shuōhuà le, qǐng gàosù wǒ nǐ de míngzì.

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 他的中文說話能力很好。
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: His Chinese speaking ability is very good.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Tā de zhōngwén shuōhuà nénglì hěn hǎo.

gpt-3.5-turbo.english: Do you like to read books?
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Nǐ xǐhuān dúshū ma?

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 我們每天晚上都讀故事給孩子聽。
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: We read stories to the children every evening.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Wǒmen měitiān wǎnshàng dōu dú gùshì gěi háizi tīng.

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 這本雜誌很有趣，你應該讀一讀。
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: This magazine is interesting, you should give it a read.

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 我每天早上都有一個讀書的習慣。
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: I have a habit of reading every morning.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Wǒ měitiān zǎoshang dōu yǒu yīgè dúshū de xíguàn.

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 你可以在圖書館裡讀書。
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: You can read books in the library.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Nǐ kěyǐ zài túshūguǎn lǐ dúshū.

gpt-3.5-turbo.english: I write a diary every day.

gpt-3.5-turbo.english: He is writing a letter to his father.

gpt-3.5-turbo.english: This book is written by myself.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Zhè běn shū shì wǒ zìjǐ xiě de.

gpt-3.5-turbo.english: I like writing Chinese characters.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Wǒ xǐhuān xiě hànzì.

gpt-3.5-turbo.english: I can write in Chinese and English.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Wǒ huì xiě zhōngwén hé yīngwén.

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 我看見一隻小貓在街上。
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: I saw a little cat on the street.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Wǒ kànjiàn yī zhī xiǎo māo zài jiē shàng.

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 妹妹聽到有人敲門就跑去看見是誰。
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: My sister ran to see who it was when she heard someone knocking on the door.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Mèimei tīng dào yǒurén qiāo mén jiù pǎo qù kànjiàn shì shéi.

gpt-3.5-turbo.english: I see him taking a walk in the park every day.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Wǒ měitiān dōu kànjiàn tā zài gōngyuán sànbù.

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 昨天晚上我在電視上看見了你。
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: I saw you on TV last night.

gpt-3.5-turbo.english: Everyone saw the child riding a bicycle.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Dàjiā dōu kànjiàn xiǎo péngyǒu zài qí zìxíngchē.

gpt-3.5-turbo.english: What is her name?

gpt-3.5-turbo.english: Call me tomorrow to have a meal together.

gpt-3.5-turbo.english: I won't come to school tomorrow.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Wǒ míngtiān bù lái xuéxiào.

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 我們明天一起來看電影吧！
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: Let's come together to watch a movie tomorrow!
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Wǒmen míngtiān yīqǐ lái kàn diànyǐng ba!

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 我和家人去年來過北京。

gpt-3.5-turbo.english: I go to bed at 10 o'clock every night.

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 我喜歡春天的時候，因為天氣很好。
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: I like the time of spring because the weather is good.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Wǒ xǐhuān chūntiān de shíhòu, yīnwèi tiānqì hěn hǎo.

gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Xīngqīwǔ wǎnshàng shì wǒmen jùhuì de shíhòu.

gpt-3.5-turbo.english: I'm going to Beijing tomorrow.

gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Wǒmen yīqǐ qù chī wǎnfàn ba!

gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Wǒ xǐhuān chī zhōngguó cài.

gpt-3.5-turbo.english: Everyone likes to have a picnic outdoors.

gpt-3.5-turbo.english: I'm very tired and want to sleep in the car.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Wǒ hěn kùn, xiǎng zài chē shàng shuìjiào.

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 晚上十點以後，我都會去睡覺。
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: I always go to sleep after ten o'clock at night.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Wǎnshàng shí diǎn yǐhòu, wǒ dōu huì qù shuìjiào.

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 明天是星期六，我可以睡覺到自然醒。
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: Tomorrow is Saturday, I can sleep until I wake up naturally.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Míngtiān shì xīngqīliù, wǒ kěyǐ shuìjiào dào zìrán xǐng.

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 我昨晚沒睡覺，所以今天一整天都很累。
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: I didn't sleep last night, so I've been tired all day today.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Wǒ zuó wǎn méi shuìjiào, suǒyǐ jīntiān yī zhěngtiān dōu hěn lèi.

gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Wǒ hěn gāoxìng rènshì nǐ.

gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Tāmen zài xuéxiào lǐ rènshì de.

gpt-3.5-turbo.english: We made many friends in our company.

gpt-3.5-turbo.english: Getting to know new cultures is very interesting.

gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Wǒ měitiān wǎnshàng dōu dǎ diànhuà gěi wǒ māma.

gpt-3.5-turbo.english: While he was making a phone call, he accidentally dropped his cellphone.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Tā zài dǎ diànhuà de shíhòu, bù xiǎoxīn jiāng shǒujī shuāi le.

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 我剛剛打了一個重要的電話。
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: I just made an important phone call.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Wǒ gānggāng dǎ le yí gè zhòngyào de diànhuà.

gpt-3.5-turbo.english: Did you call him?
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Nǐ dǎ diànhuà gěi tā le ma?

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 我剛才聽到了一個妙不可言的電話笑話。
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: I just heard a hilarious phone joke.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Wǒ gāngcái tīng dào le yí gè miào bù kě yán de diànhuà xiàohua.

gpt-3.5-turbo.english: I like to cook.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Wǒ xǐhuān zuò fàn.

gpt-3.5-turbo.english: He often exercises.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Tā jīngcháng zuò yùndòng.

gpt-3.5-turbo.english: She does homework at home.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Tā zài jiā lǐ zuò gōngkè.

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 明天我要去做銀行的事情。
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: Tomorrow I need to do some banking.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Míngtiān wǒ yào qù zuò yínháng de shìqíng.

gpt-3.5-turbo.english: He does yoga every day.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Tā měitiān dōu zuò yújiā.

gpt-3.5-turbo.english: I am very happy to see you.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Wǒ hěn gāoxìng jiàn dào nǐ.

gpt-3.5-turbo.english: I am happy every morning.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Wǒ měi tiān zǎoshàng dōu hěn gāoxìng.

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 他成功實現了自己的夢想，感到非常高興。
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: He successfully achieved his dreams and feels very happy.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Tā chénggōng shíxiàn le zìjǐ de mèngxiǎng, gǎndào fēicháng gāoxìng.

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 過生日的時候，我非常高興。
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: I am very happy on my birthday.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Guò shēngrì de shíhou, wǒ fēicháng gāoxìng.

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 你的喜訊讓我感到很高興。
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: I am very happy about your good news.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Nǐ de xǐxùn ràng wǒ gǎndào hěn gāoxìng.

gpt-3.5-turbo.english: I would like to buy a cup of coffee.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Wǒ xiǎng mǎi yī bēi kāfēi.

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 他每天都買壹個漢堡包。
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: He buys a hamburger every day.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Tā měitiān dōu mǎi yī gè hànbǎobāo.

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 這家商店賣的東西很便宜。
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: The things sold in this store are very cheap.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Zhè jiā shāngdiàn mài de dōngxi hěn piányí.

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 我們需要買許多新衣服。
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: We need to buy many new clothes.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Wǒmen xūyào mǎi xǔduō xīn yīfú.

gpt-3.5-turbo.english: I don't have time to buy gifts.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Wǒ méiyǒu shíjiān mǎi lǐwù.

gpt-3.5-turbo.english: He used a key to open the door.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Tā yòng yàoshi kāile mén.

gpt-3.5-turbo.english: I drive to the company.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Wǒ kāi chē qù gōngsī.

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 我需要開始學習新的課程。
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: I need to start learning a new course.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Wǒ xūyào kāishǐ xuéxí xīn de kèchéng.

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 朋友開著音樂的車來接我。
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: My friend came to pick me up in a car with music playing.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Péngyǒu kāizhe yīnyuè de chē lái jiē wǒ.

gpt-3.5-turbo.english: The match starts tomorrow.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Míngtiān bǐsài kāishǐ.

gpt-3.5-turbo.english: Please have a seat.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Qǐng zuòxiàlái.

gpt-3.5-turbo.english: I like to take the bus.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Wǒ xǐhuān zuò gōnggòng qìchē.

gpt-3.5-turbo.english: He takes a plane to go abroad.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Tā zuò fēijī qù guówài.

gpt-3.5-turbo.english: I usually take the train to go to work.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Wǒ tōngcháng zuò huǒchē shàngbān.

gpt-3.5-turbo.english: Let's take a taxi together.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Wǒmen yīqǐ zuò jìchéngchē ba.

gpt-3.5-turbo.english: I live in Taipei.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Wǒ zhù zài Táiběi.

gpt-3.5-turbo.english: He lives in this building.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Tā zhù zài zhè ge dàlóu.

gpt-3.5-turbo.english: My younger sister lives in the school dormitory.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Wǒ mèimei zhù zài xuéxiào sùshè.

gpt-3.5-turbo.english: My friend lives by the seaside.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Wǒ péngyǒu zhù zài hǎibiān.

gpt-3.5-turbo.english: The teacher lives in this small town.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Lǎoshī zhù zài zhè ge xiǎozhèn shàng.

gpt-3.5-turbo.english: I study Chinese every day.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Wǒ měitiān dōu xuéxí zhōngwén.

gpt-3.5-turbo.english: Do you like to study?
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Nǐ xǐhuān xuéxí ma?

gpt-3.5-turbo.english: Where do you study, may I ask?
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Qǐngwèn nǐ zài nǎlǐ xuéxí?

gpt-3.5-turbo.english: She likes to study in the library.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Tā xǐhuān zài túshū guǎn xuéxí.

gpt-3.5-turbo.english: I want to learn to speak Chinese.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Wǒ xiǎng xuéxí shuō zhōngwén.

gpt-3.5-turbo.english: I work at a company.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Wǒ zài yī jiā gōngsī gōngzuò.

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 他每天都很努力地工作。
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: He works hard every day.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Tā měitiān dōu hěn nǔlì de gōngzuò.

gpt-3.5-turbo.english: My dad's job is very hard.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Wǒ bàba de gōngzuò hěn xīnkǔ.

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 她最近找到了一份工作。
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: She recently found a job.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Tā zuìjìn zhǎodào le yī fèn gōngzuò.

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 他被公司解雇了，現在正在找工作。
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: He was fired by the company and is now looking for a job.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Tā bèi gōngsī jiěgù le, xiànzài zhèngzài zhǎo gōngzuò.
